name: The Healthy Choice
tag_list: bioidentical-hormone-replacement-therapy, bio-identical-hormones, natural-hormones, natural-hormone-therapy, hormone-analysis, hormone-imbalance
overview:
Bio-Identical Hormones, Natural Hormone Therapy and Menopause Relief at The Healthy Choice

Consult with the BHRT Bio Identical Hormone Replacement Therapy Experts. The Healthy Choice Pharmacy and Compounding Specialist Phil Altman have created a personalized program designed to address the specific hormonal imbalances of your body. They can assist you with numerous natural hormone replacement treatments and specialist referrals. Visit the website for free Personalized Hormone Analysis and Consultation http://www.thehealthychoice.net/
